name: Visa Lawyer Group
tag_list: visa-lawyer, visa-attorney, fiance-visa, k1-visa, k3-visa, i-130-visa, immigration-visas
overview:
Visa Lawyer Group (VLG) offers online and offline legal support for Fiance Visas (K1 visas), Marriage Visas (I-130 visas), Spousal Visas (K3 visa), Adjustment of Status, Naturalization, Removal of Conditions, and more.

VLG is provided by Dorfman, Knoebel & Conway, LLP, which has over 100 years of combined legal experience and offices in Nyack, New York and Manhattan, New York City. VLG is committed to provide the most experienced immigration visa lawyers in the nation and their staff has successfully prepared and filed over 1,000 US immigration visa applications with USCIS and U.S. Consulates around the world including but not limited to, India, Russia, China, Brazil, Germany and Italy. Their dedicated professionals pride themselves in providing individual attention to each case and are invested in their clientâ€™s success.

In addition to immigration law, the firm is successfully engaged in corporate law, securities, commercial and residential real estate, estate and other financial planning, and litigation.

The firmâ€™s mission is to deliver high-quality legal services in a practical and efficient manner bringing to bear the judgment, common sense and expertise of highly educated, well-trained and business-minded lawyers.

Members of the firm have served with distinction in a variety of government posts including Assistant District Attorney, New York State Estate Tax Attorney and Sitting Local Village Justice.
